Package com.cafean.client.validation

Class AbstractValidationWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cafean.client.validation.AbstractValidationWrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ModelElement
    public abstract class AbstractValidationWrapper
extends java.lang.Object
implements ModelElement
    A utility interface that handles a model's export and validation procedures.
    See Also:
    ValidationDisplayPanel, ExportContext, ContextWriter

    • Method Detail

      • exportModel

        public abstract boolean exportModel​(java.io.PrintWriter out)
        Exports this wrapper's model to the given writer.

        Note that the given PrintWriter is also a ContextWriter.

        Parameters:
        out - the PrintWriter to export into
        Returns:
        true for success, false for failure

      • isValidationEnabled

        public boolean isValidationEnabled()
        Returns true if this wrapper supports runtime model validation via built-in logic and/or an external application execution.
        Returns:
        true if validation is supported

      • validateModel

        public java.lang.String validateModel​(java.lang.String contents)
                               throws java.io.IOException
        Performs a runtime model validation of this wrapper's model via built-in logic and/or an external application execution.
        Parameters:
        contents - a String containing the full ASCII representation of the model
        Returns:
        a String containing the results of the validation
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - for all validation failures

      • findAsciiLocation

        public int findAsciiLocation​(int validationCaretLoc,
                             javax.swing.text.StyledDocument validationDocument,
                             javax.swing.text.StyledDocument asciiDocument)
        Returns caret location in the given model ASCII display document corresponding to the given caret location in the given validation results document.
        Parameters:
        validationCaretLoc - the caret location in the given validation document
        asciiDocument - the StyledDocument containing the ASCII display
        validationDocument - the StyledDocument containing the validation results
        Returns:
        the desired caret location (>=0) or -1 if there is no corresponding location

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns the name of this wrapper object.
        Returns:
        a String containing the plug-in ID of this wrapper's model.

      • getModel

        public AbstractModel getModel()
        Description copied from interface: ModelElement
        Retrieves the model that contains this ModelElement.

        This method may call a parent's getModel() and so on rather than a direct reference.

        Specified by:
        getModel in interface ModelElement
        Returns:
        the AbstractModel that contains this ModelElement

      • createAsciiDocument

        public javax.swing.text.StyledDocument createAsciiDocument​(Writeable writeable)
        Returns a styled document appropriate for the display of the ASCII form of this wrapper's model that will be generated by this wrapper.
        Parameters:
        writeable - the Writeable for which create an appropriate document or null if the document will be used to display an entire model.
        Returns:
        the StyledDocument that should be used to display the model
        See Also:
        MECodePlugin.getAsciiStyledDocument(Writeable)

      • createContextWriter

        public ContextWriter createContextWriter​(Writeable writeable)
        Returns a context writer implementation that should be used to create the ASCII form of this wrapper's model. Note that the writer returned must also be an extension of PrintWriter.

        This default implementation returns an instance of DefaultContextWriter.

        Parameters:
        writeable - the Writeable for which to create a context writer
        Returns:
        the ContextWriter that will be used
        See Also:
        DefaultContextWriter

      • createValidationDocument

        public javax.swing.text.StyledDocument createValidationDocument()
        Returns a styled document appropriate for the display of the validation results will be generated by this wrapper.

        This default implementation returns a new DefaultStyledDocument.

        Returns:
        the StyledDocument that should be used to display the results
